query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS app_module_configs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT NOT NULL COMMENT 'APP ID',
  module_code VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '模块代码',
  config_data JSON NOT NULL COMMENT '配置数据(JSON格式)',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  UNIQUE KEY uk_app_module (app_id, module_code),
  INDEX idx_app_id (app_id),
  INDEX idx_module_code (module_code)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='APP模块配置表';

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT NOT NULL COMMENT 'APP ID',
  module_code VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '模块代码',
  config_data JSON NOT NULL COMMENT '配置数据(JSON格式)',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间',
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间',
  UNIQUE KEY uk_app_module (app_id, module_code),
  INDEX idx_app_id (app_id),
  INDEX idx_module_code (module_code)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COMMENT='APP模块配置表';
